files_base.description: NEW: A base URL up to the folder containing the data files. This can be concatenated with the paths for individual data files below to obtain a full URL.

templates_base.description: NEW: A base URL up to the folder containing data file templates. This can be concatenated with the paths for individual templates to obtain a full URL.

start_date.description: A human-readable (US) date string for the start of the file range, in MM/DD/YYYY format.

end_date.description: A human-readable (US) date string for the end of the file range, in MM/DD/YYYY format.

date_modified.description: A human-readable (US) date string for the last time the data in this set was modified, in MM/DD/YYYY format. This may change if old data is re-exported with new feature extractors, for example.

ogd_revision.description: The Git short hash for the commit version of opengamedata-core that produced the data set.

sessions.description: The number of sessions included in this dataset

events_file.description: A path to the zip file containing the *event* data file, beginning with base data folder. It can be concatenated with CONFIG.files_base to obtain a full URL. Null if this dataset does not include an event file.

sessions_file.description: A path to the zip file containing the *session* data file, beginning with base data folder. It can be concatenated with CONFIG.files_base to obtain a full URL. Null if this dataset does not include a session file.

players_file.description: A path to the zip file containing the *player* data file, beginning with base data folder. It can be concatenated with CONFIG.files_base to obtain a full URL. Null if this dataset does not include a player file.

population_file.description: A path to the zip file containing the *population* data file, beginning with base data folder. It can be concatenated with CONFIG.files_base to obtain a full URL. Null if this dataset does not include a population file.

raw_file.description: Legacy element that may appear in some older index items. We no longer produce 'raw' files, and this element can be ignored

sessions_template.description: NEW: A path to the ipynb file template for the *session* data file. It can be concatenated with CONFIG.templates_base to obtain a full URL. Null if this dataset does not include as session file.

players_template.description: NEW: A path to the ipynb file template for the *player* data file. It can be concatenated with CONFIG.templates_base to obtain a full URL. Null if this dataset does not include as player file.

population_template.description: NEW: A path to the ipynb file template for the *population* data file. It can be concatenated with CONFIG.templates_base to obtain a full URL. Null if this dataset does not include as population file.
